item.content:encoded:
TOFFEE/CANDY PILLOW PACK MACHINE

We are engaged in manufacturing a quality range of candy pillow pack machine for our clients spread nationwide. These candy pillow pack machine are manufactured from quality-tested raw material and are known for its unique features such as high tensile strength, dimensional accuracy and sturdy construction. We also meet customized requirement for our clients benefit.

Specifications:
Product output 300 to 450 candies per minute (Optional size available)
Power required Motor 1Hp. DC with DC drive
Voltage 220 volts
Phase Single Phase
Load L 2.5 Kw
Packing Material All type of Laminated
Dimension L-1800mm, W-1000mm,H-1360mm
Weight 700 Kg. (Approx)

The post Candy Pillow Pack Machine appeared first on Zara International- Pouch Packing Machine, Food Processing Machine.
